body:
Jesus told a story about seeds falling on different kinds of ground. What kind of 'ground' is our heart when we hear God's Word?

Reflection:

  • What helps God's Word grow in our lives?
  • What things can choke it out?

Saul fiercely persecuted Christians, but then he met Jesus on the road to Damascus! How did this encounter change him completely?

Key Point:

God can change anyone's heart.
